title: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings DX
body:

Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese, Turn-based
Companies: Gust, Koei Tecmo Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 16.3 GB
Repack Size: from 4.5 GB [Selective Download]

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Atelier.Lydie.and.Suelle.The.Alchemists.and.the.Mysterious.Paintings.DX-CODEX ISO release: codex-atelier.lydie.and.suelle.the.alchemists.and.the.mysterious.paintings.dx.iso (17,517,805,568 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of DLC audio tracks, credits video, digital artbook and Japanese/Chinese videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 16.3 to 4.5~7.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-15 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 23.5 GB
  • Audio language can be changed in game settings
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game UI language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The Mysterious series combines heart-warming everyday elements with extraordinary experiences in a world full of wonders.

The 3rd instalment, “Atelier Lydie & Suelle”, is back in DX form!

What makes it DX

  • A new painting based on the world of “Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists: Ateliers of the New World”, featuring new story episodes and a new boss enemy!
  • New “Nelke’s world” painting fragments scattered around various painting worlds.
  • ‘Fast Forward’ feature for fast-paced battles!
  • Lots of previously released DLC!
  • Photo mode to enjoy capturing beautiful images!

~ Our Dreams Await on the Other Side of that Painting ~

Twin sisters Lydie and Suelle are two novice alchemists. One day, after discovering a mysterious painting, they get closer to turning their dream of running the best atelier in the kingdom into reality.

Hone your alchemy skills by exploring the mysterious worlds inside paintings and collecting ingredients through exploring and defeating monsters. Aim to become the best atelier in the kingdom by completing many requests and tasks and raising your atelier rank.
